title: The Reunion
occurrences: "You are therefore invited to a reunion with the old gang."
I'm not going to that reunion.
He probably won't be going to the reunion either.
- At the reunion, maybe? - I told you, I'm not going.

Thrilled that I shave my balls before a school reunion?
I'm not opening mine. I can't come to the reunion with a negative result.
That's the reunion cliche numero uno.

- but you're not leaving here tonight without hearing the reunion speech.
